content:
Praveen Venkateswaran

I am a third year Computer Science Ph.D student at the University of California, Irvine.

Research

I am currently part of the Distributed Systems Middleware group working with Prof. Nalini Venkatasubramanian. My research interests include Internet of Things (IoT), Edge Computing, Data Exchange and Management, Resilient Middleware, and Cyber-Physical Systems.

Prior to joining UCI, I worked with Dr. Maitreya Natu and Dr. Vaishali Sadaphal at Tata Research Development and Design Centre, Pune, India.

Contact

  • Office: DBH 2059
  • E-mail: praveenv at uci dot edu
  • LinkedIn
  • Curriculum Vitae

Publications

Praveen Venkateswaran, Mahima Agumbe Suresh, Nalini Venkatasubramanian - "Augmenting In-situ with Mobile Sensing for Adaptive Monitoring of Water Distribution Networks" Under Submission .

Praveen Venkateswaran, Qing Han, Ronald Eguchi, Nalini Venkatasubramanian - "Impact Driven Sensor Placement for Leak Detection in Community Water Networks" ACM/IEEE International Conference on Cyber-physical Systems (ICCPS) , 2018.

Praveen Venkateswaran, Vikrant Shimpi, Maitreya Natu, Vaishali Sadaphal - "Domain Driven Forecasting: Applying Theory into Practice" Data Mining for Service (DMS), International Conference on Data Mining Workshops (ICDMW), 2016.

Praveen Venkateswaran, Aruna Malapati, Maitreya Natu, Vaishali Sadaphal - "Towards Next-Generation Alert Management of Data Centers", Graduate Research Forum, International Conference on Communication Systems and Networks (COMSNETS), 2016.

Praveen Venkateswaran, Aruna Malapati, Maitreya Natu, Vaishali Sadaphal - "Smart Triggers: Using Analytics for Smart Alerting", Graduate Forum, International Conference on High Performance Computing (HiPC), 2014
